CustomField.description: Unique, machine-readable name used to reference this configuration in code, lookups, and Agent Definitions. Cannot contain spaces or special characters other than underscore.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The unique identifier for this LLM setup (e.g., 'OpenAI_GPT4o_Default', 'Claude3_Sonnet_West'). Used internally by the framework. Make it descriptive.
CustomField.label: Developer Name
